definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]

sentences.english: He suspects young footballers from poorer nations are being targeted by criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 他懷疑來自貧困國家的球員是犯罪團伙的目標。

sentences.english: How did the criminal gangs of Zhang Hong and Zhang Jieliang wash their guilt in collusion with a legal practitioner?
sentences.chinese: 張虹張傑良等犯罪團伙，同法律工作者如何洗罪？

sentences.english: Many in Baltimore believe he was beaten by local criminal gangs.
sentences.chinese: 巴爾的摩的許多人認爲他被當地的犯罪團伙毆打了。

sentences.english: Later, Joe slipped into crime to help reduce the burden of family.
sentences.chinese: 之後，喬也加入了犯罪團伙，想幫助減輕家庭負擔。

sentences.english: Mexican officials said the suspect had confessed to being a lookout for the gang.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥官員表示，嫌疑人交待，曾爲犯罪團伙放哨。

sentences.english: By inquest , he fessed that he was the chief instigator of this crime group.
sentences.chinese: 經過審訊，他供認了他是這個犯罪團伙的主謀。

sentences.english: The criminal gang of hooligans has finally been eliminated by the police.
sentences.chinese: 這個流氓犯罪團伙終於被警方芟夷了。

sentences.english: This criminal band set many traps to cheat people through gambling.
sentences.chinese: 這個犯罪團伙以賭博的方式，設局騙了不少人。

sentences.english: In reality, the boys are facing gangs, they're facing arrest.
sentences.chinese: 現實是，男孩面臨着犯罪團伙，面臨着被逮捕的危險。

sentences.english: The gang commit three armed holdup on the same day.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪團伙在同一天進行了三次武裝搶劫。

sentences.english: "There is no group that it is impossible to confront, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 任何一個犯罪團伙都不可能逃掉。

sentences.english: I now request my lawyer to prosecute Zhang Hong, Zhang Jieliang and their criminal gang.
sentences.chinese: 本人要求律師立即起訴張虹張傑良犯罪團伙。

sentences.english: The government official connived with a criminal gang to smuggle goods.
sentences.chinese: 該政府官員與一個犯罪團伙相勾結，進行走私活動。

sentences.english: After interrogation, he confessed that he is the mastermind of the criminal gang.
sentences.chinese: 經過審訊，他供認了他是這個犯罪團伙的主謀。

sentences.english: He confessed that he was the prime suspect of criminal gang on trial.
sentences.chinese: 經過審訊，他供認了他是這個犯罪團伙的主謀。

sentences.english: Left to raise themselves on the streets, these children form roving bands of delinquents.
sentences.chinese: 這些孩子被迫流浪街頭，結成了一些流竄的犯罪團伙。
